trans-unit.source: This module allows you to accept secure payments by bank wire.
trans-unit.target: This module allows you to accept secure payments by bank wire.

trans-unit.source: If the client chooses to pay by bank wire, the order's status will change to 'Waiting for Payment.
trans-unit.target: If the client chooses to pay by bank wire, the order's status will change to 'Waiting for Payment.

trans-unit.source: That said, you must manually confirm the order upon receiving the bank wire.
trans-unit.target: That said, you must manually confirm the order upon receiving the bank wire.
